```{r}
#/ message : false
library (tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library (tsibble)
library (feasts)
library (fable)
library(tsibbledata)
library (fpp3)
library (lubridate)
library (fable.prophet)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
train<- read_csv("train.csv")
```

```{r}
#| echo: true

train_tsbl<- train|>
  as_tsibble(index=date, key=c(store_nbr, family))


train_tsbl
```

```{r}
train_tsbl <- train_tsbl |> 
  fill_gaps(.full = TRUE, 
            sales = 0L,
            onpromotion = 0L) 


```

```{r}

fit<- train_tsbl |> 
  model(
    snaive = SNAIVE (sales)
  )
tictoc::toc()

fit
```
